headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Discourse on Romanism. The Veterans of 1812. Northwestern Dispensary. Extension of Albany-street. City Mortality. Meeting in the Park. Arrival of the Glasgow. COMMON PLEAS--SPECIAL TERM MARINE COURT.

docs.lead_paragraph: The second discourse of the series on Remanism under the patror age of the American and Foreign Citristian Union, was delivered last evening at the Church on Madison-square, by Rev. Dr. ADAMS, from the following text: "One day with the Lord is as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day."

headline.main: DICK INTO ON HIS TRAVELS..; Shivers and Admires Genoa--A Vermont Climate--How the People Look--The Streets and Palaces--The Statue of a Great American Proposed--Off Leghorn.

docs.lead_paragraph: It was early sunrise when we arrived at Genoa, but it was 10 o'clock before we were able to land. All this time was dawdled away in mere port fooleries, in examination of bills ,of health, passports, It was necessary to be sure that we had not King Cholera or Commoner MAZZINI tucked away in our pocket-books. nd besides, life is tediously
